tweet: Holiday Inn Express - a great motorcoach stop - just off the PA Turnpike, I-79 and I-279.  We're right next to a Bravo and Eat 'N' Park.
Holiday Inn Express Cranberry Township - a proud member of the American Bus Association!
I still can't believe the government wants to turn Interstate 80 into a toll road - hold on to your wallets!
Go to visit www.butlercountry.com and find out what there is to do in the Cranberry Township area this holiday season
Hungry?  Go next to the Holiday Inn Express and get stuffed at Bravo or Eat N Park.
